title: The Strife of Camlann
description: Arthurâ€™s Men have returned to Britain to keep the peace between fractious allies. Gawain wants only to raise his family and forget the war, yet he carries a heavy burden: an oath to maintain a terrible lie.But is it a lie?Looming conflicts threaten more than any border or throne. The course of history, the future of the Britons, will be decided at Camlann.The Strife of Camlann is the second book the historical fiction series, The Arthurian Age, introducing readers to the origins of King Arthur and the world he lived and fought for.
author: Sean Poage
